name: Widget
description: The Widget class supports spawning Unreal Widgets classes through scripting and manipulate them such as Blueprints!

parameters.name: blueprint_path
parameters.description: A custom UserWidget Blueprint to spawn

parameters.name: native_widget
parameters.description: One of the native Widgets to spawn

functions.name: SpawnWidget3D
functions.description: Spawns a 3D Widget actor rendering this Widget in the world

functions.name: SetFocus
functions.description: Enables the focus on this Widget (i.e. can receive Keyboard input and will trigger input events)
functions.description_long:
Enables the focus on this Widget (i.e. can receive Keyboard input and will trigger input events
Note: Only one Widget can have focus per time.

functions.name: BringToFront
functions.description: Puts this Widget in the front of all WebUIs and Widgets
functions.description_long: Puts this Widget in the front of all WebUIs and Widgets. Note: You can only call it if the Widget is parented to the Viewport!

functions.name: AddToViewport
functions.description: Adds it to the game's viewport and fills the entire screen

functions.name: AddChild
functions.description: Adds a new child widget to this Widget container, if this is a Panel

functions.name: SetContentForSlot
functions.description: Sets the widget for a given slot by name, if this is a UserWidget

parameters.name: widget
parameters.description: Pass it nil to remove it

functions.name: SetCanvasLayout
functions.description: Sets the Layout as Canvas on Screen
functions.description_long:
Sets the Layout as Canvas on Screen.

Note: This method only works if this Widget is child of a Canvas Panel.

Anchors:

functions.name: CallBlueprintEvent
functions.description: Calls a Blueprint Event or Function
functions.description_long:
Calls a Blueprint Event or Function
Returns all Function return values on Client Side

parameters.name: arguments...
parameters.description: Sequence of arguments to pass to the event

functions.name: BindBlueprintEventDispatcher
functions.description: Assigns and Binds a Blueprint Event Dispatcher

functions.name: SetBlueprintPropertyValue
functions.description: Sets a Blueprint Property/Variable value directly
